articles.title: Meet businessman who hosted Amitabh Bachchan's grand birthday celebration, honoured Bollywood superstar - DNA India
articles.description: Businessman Sunil Shah acquired valuable possessions like two cars once driven by Amitabh Bachchan, several of his clothes and many souvenirs signed and letters penned by him. He has now added a shiny new Big B statue made of 500g gold to his collection.
